ShortDescription: Revolutionize the way you teach and learn with Flipick. And now, we're thrilled to announce the launch of CourseBOT - the AI-assisted automation tool that makes creating and modifying course content easier than ever before.

Highlights.name: Automating textbook content for e-learning.
Highlights.description: Re-purpose textbook content designed for traditional classroom learning into engaging e-learning courses that are tailored to specific learning objectives. Automate the process of content creation and modification, save time and money while ensuring that the content is of the highest quality.

Highlights.name: Keywords and images for effective e-learning.
Highlights.description: Generate keywords to search and link images, video, and audio assets, creating a multimedia experience that is engaging and effective. Create courses that are not only informative but also visually appealing and interactive.

Highlights.name: Workflow for automation.
Highlights.description: Analyze and break down textbook content into its component parts before generating a Voice over script tailored to the specific course. AI selects and links relevant images, video, and audio assets, resulting in a multimedia course that is both engaging and effective.

enhanced_description: Flipick is an AI-enhanced learning platform that provides customized learning solutions for individuals, businesses, and consumers across Education, B2B, and B2C sectors. It specializes in revolutionizing content creation by automating the transformation of traditional textbook content into engaging e-learning courses using its AI-assisted tool, CourseBOT. The platform offers powerful features to streamline content creation and modification, including automated keyword generation, multimedia asset linking (images, video, audio), and voice-over script generation, aiming to make education and training more engaging, effective, and efficient.
